properties.description: Array containing nodes that prevent the scroll from happening
properties.name: _preventDragNodes

properties.description: Indicates whether we want arrow scrolls or not
properties.name: arrowScrolls

properties.description: Indicates whether the scroll will autofill its container or grow according to its content until it fills its container
properties.name: fillContainer

properties.description: Indicates whether the scroll will autofill its container or grow according to its content until it fills its container
properties.name: fit

properties.description: Whether it sould use the native scroll on devices
properties.name: nativeOnDevice

properties.description: Indicates whether we want some scroll rails to push the content or not, none/horizontal/vertical/both
properties.name: pushContent

properties.description: Indicates whether we want rail scrolls or not
properties.name: railScroll

properties.description: Indicates whether we want some scroll rails to be always visible or not, none/horizontal/vertical/both
properties.name: static

properties.description: Indicates the thickness for the scroll rails
properties.name: thickness

methods.description: Creates the horizontal scroll nodes structure
methods.name: _createHorizontalScroll

methods.description: Creates the horizontal arrow scrolls nodes structure
methods.name: _createHorizontalScrollArrows

methods.name: _createScrollEventObject

methods.description: Creates the vertical scroll nodes structure

methods.description: Creates the vertical arrow scrolls nodes structure

methods.description: Returns the current horizontal content scrolling position based on the horizontal bar

methods.description: Returns the current vertical content scrolling position based on the vertical bar

methods.description: Returns the value of the vertical scroll limit

methods.description: Returns the vertical scroll position

methods.description: Handles and updates the current direction of the scroll
methods.name: _handleDirection

methods.description: Handles the scrolling when dragging
methods.name: _handleDrag

methods.description: Handles whether the user has left the drag threshold

methods.description: Eases the drag-release animation
methods.name: _handleEaseAnimation

methods.description: Eases the drag-release animation
methods.name: _handleEaseAnimation

methods.description: Handles the drag of the horizontal scrollbar

methods.description: Handles the length of the vertical scroll
methods.name: _handleHorizontalScrollLength

methods.description: Handles whether the user has left the inert threshold
methods.name: _handleInertThreshold

params.description: Whether the user wants a transition while scrolling to the request position
params.name: transition

methods.description: Handles the scroll resizes when the contents size has changed

params.description: Whether the user wants a transition while scrolling to the request position

methods.description: Sets up the basic Events

methods.description: Sets up basic aspects of the scroll container

methods.description: Sets up basic aspects of the scroll content, such as pushing it with the scroll rails or adding the resize listener
methods.name: _setupContent

methods.description: Sets up the pointer events for devices
methods.name: _setupDeviceEvents

methods.description: Assigns fit heights/widths

methods.description: Reads all the source nodes and appends them to a fragment
methods.name: _setupFragmentForSourceNodes

methods.description: Sets up the horizontal scroll

methods.description: Sets up basic properties for the misc object

params.description: Whether the user wants a transition while scrolling to the request position
params.name: transition

methods.description: function_description

methods.description: Cancel drag-release scrolling
